title: List All Blocks
description: The Public API may be used to query for blocks. This dataset contains millions of blocks; thus for analytical purposes, we recommend you use the [Elasticsearch](https://github.com/ArkEcosystem/gitbooks-api/tree/9815499ca52e615b8de858160da915cd960e6ea3/elasticsearch/getting-started/README.md) plugin or query the database directly.

page.description: The number of the page that will be returned.

limit.description: The number of resources per page.

offset.description: The number of resources to be skipped.

transform.description: The structure of response to be retrieved.

orderBy.description: The column and order by which the resources will be sorted.

id.description: The identifiers of the blocks to be retrieved.

height.description: The heights of the blocks to be retrieved.

height.from.description: The height from by which blocks will be retrieved.

height.to.description: The height to by which blocks will be retrieved.

timestamp.description: The timestamps of the blocks to be retrieved.

timestamp.from.description: The timestamp from by which blocks will be retrieved.

timestamp.to.description: The timestamp to by which blocks will be retrieved.
